thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Jennifer
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: So easy to get around, just show your JR pass at the turnstiles. For longer journeys/certain trains it is possible to reserve a seat; easy enough to do a day or so ahead of the journey at the JR counter at nearly any station. So easy, would recommend to anyone planning to catch many trains around Japan (which you should!)
